snippet: More than 100 people came to Morningside College in Iowa to hear Senator’s Ted Cruz’s thoughts on the battle over a law in Indiana billed as a religious freedom measure.
abstract: More than 100 people came to Morningside College in Iowa to hear Senator’s Ted Cruz’s thoughts on the battle over a law in Indiana billed as a religious freedom measure.

headline.main: Cruz, in Iowa, Commends Indiana for ‘Doing the Right Thing’
